column1: Baby Barnaby's////Saturday brunch and Baby Barnaby's was our destination. We waited about 20 minutes which was no big deal. The service was very good and prompt. The seating is cramped
column2: but that is part of the ambiance. The food is satisfactory. The fried breakfast potatoes are fabulous! I loved them. The eggs were eggs. The bacon was rubbery. I love bacon and I couldn't even eat a whole piece. My husband and I shared a waffle. It had a strange flavor. Our friends also had a waffle as well
column3: and they agreed that it was generally weird and not a great waffle. One of our friends had the green eggs and said they were delicious! The biscuits were also very good. So
column4: we had both good and so-so in our meal. Â
